attributes.action: Stop putting a price of £1000(or more) yearly payments for universities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who thinks we are paying FAR TOO MUCH for University?
We go there to learn and it's just a higher education to college!

Who thinks it would be a better idea to just pay when we start University?

Who thinks our money is wasted?
